A data transfer object (DTO) that defines filtering criteria for querying events through the REST API, supporting filters by users, event types, and date ranges.

## Key Components

- **userIds** - List of user identifiers to filter events by specific users
- **eventTypes** - List of event type strings to filter by event categories
- **startDate** - Beginning date boundary for time-based filtering
- **endDate** - Ending date boundary for time-based filtering

## Usage Example

```java
// Create filter criteria for specific users and date range
EventFilterCriteria criteria = EventFilterCriteria.builder()
    .userIds(List.of("user123", "user456"))
    .eventTypes(List.of("LOGIN", "LOGOUT", "DATA_ACCESS"))
    .startDate(LocalDate.of(2024, 1, 1))
    .endDate(LocalDate.of(2024, 3, 31))
    .build();

// Use in REST API call
ResponseEntity<List<Event>> events = eventService.getFilteredEvents(criteria);
```

The class uses Lombok annotations for automatic generation of getters, setters, constructors, and builder pattern. Swagger annotations provide API documentation with field descriptions and examples for OpenAPI specification generation.
